description.value: When you terrorize your enemies, you also cause them painful mental distress. When you successfully @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.Demoralize]{Demoralize} a foe, that foe takes 1d4 mental damage at the start of each of its turns as long as it remains @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Frightened]{Frightened} and continues to engage in combat with you. If you have master proficiency inIntimidation, the damage increases to 2d4, and if you have legendary proficiency, the damage increases to 3d4.
